alert.note: Alert for Hunt; Rockwall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 26 at 3:14PM CDT until October 27 at 4:24AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan affecting Hunt and Rockwall Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork Sabine River near Quinlan. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 14.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to flood stage this afternoon. It will then fall to 5.0 feet early Saturday morning. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
